punar lepam prakurvīta lāṅgalī kanda sambhavam
tribhiḥ lepaiḥ drutam loham nirmalam svaccha vāri vat
cūrṇitam devi kūrma asthi meṣa śṛṅgam śilājatu
kurute prativāpena balavat jalavat sthiram
arka apāmārga musalī niculam citrakam tathā

original: kadalī potakī dālī kṣārameṣāṃ tu sādhayet // Ras_7.133 //
analyzed: kadalī potakī dālī kṣāram eṣām tu sādhayet
gālayet māhiṣe mūtre ṣaṣ vārān suravandite
āvāpāt drāvayet eta dabhra sattva ādi jam rajaḥ

original: dantīdanto viśeṣeṇa drāvayet salilaṃ yathā // Ras_7.135 //
analyzed: dantī dantaḥ viśeṣeṇa drāvayet salilam yathā
rasena uttaravāruṇyāḥ plutam vaikrānta jam rajaḥ
prativāpena lohāni drāvayet salila upamam

original: ratnānāṃ drāvaṇaṃ vakṣye gaganasya drutiṃ tathā // Ras_7.137 //
analyzed: ratnānām drāvaṇam vakṣye gaganasya drutim tathā
triphalā ca trikaṭukam trikṣāram paṭupañcakam

original: balā cātibalā caiva tṛtīyā ca mahābalā // Ras_7.138 //
analyzed: balā ca atibalā ca eva tṛtīyā ca mahābalā
gopendramaṇḍalī ca eva ṣaḍbinduḥ dvimukhī tathā
dhīrā sūraṇa kandaḥ ca kañcukī ca punarnavā
ayaskāntaḥ gokṣuraḥ ca mṛdu dūrvā amlavetasam
śilājatu ca sauvīram viṣa gandhaka ṭaṅkaṇam
pṛthak daśa palam sarvam sūkṣma cūrṇam tu kārayet

original: kumbhadvayaṃ kulatthānāṃ kāṣṭhena tiniśasya ca // Ras_7.142 //
analyzed: kumbha dvayam kulatthānām kāṣṭhena tiniśasya ca
kvāthayet mṛdu tāpena yāvat kumbha avaśeṣitam
tena kvāthena tat cūrṇam bhāvayet ekaviṃśatim

original: ratnāni tena liptāni tatkvāthasthaṃ dhamet punaḥ /
analyzed: ratnāni tena liptāni tad kvātha stham dhamet punar

original: ahorātreṇa tānyāśu dravanti salilaṃ yathā // Ras_7.144 //
analyzed: ahorātreṇa tāni āśu dravanti salilam yathā
abhraka ādīni lohāni dravanti hi avicārataḥ

original: nirmalāni ca jāyante harabījopamāni ca // Ras_7.145 //
analyzed: nirmalāni ca jāyante hara bīja upamāni ca
milanti ca rasena āśu vahni sthāni akṣayāṇi ca

original: tair drutaiḥ sparśamātreṇa kṣaṇād badhyeta sūtakaḥ // Ras_7.146 //
analyzed: taiḥ drutaiḥ sparśa mātreṇa kṣaṇāt badhyeta sūtakaḥ
lohānām māraṇam vakṣye samāhita manāḥ śṛṇu

original: snuhīkṣīreṇa sindūraṃ kanakaṃ rajataṃ punaḥ // Ras_7.147 //
analyzed: snuhī kṣīreṇa sindūram kanakam rajatam punar
tena eva mākṣikam tāmram ajā kṣīreṇa gandhakam
stanyena hiṅgulam tīkṣṇam vaṅga tāla palāśakam

original: mārayet puṭapākena nirutthaṃ bhasma jāyate // Ras_7.149 //
analyzed: mārayet puṭapākena niruttham bhasma jāyate

original: na so 'sti lohamātaṃgo yaṃ na gandhakakesarī /
analyzed: na saḥ sti loha mātaṃgaḥ yam na gandhakakesarī
nihanyāt gandha mātreṇa yat vā mākṣikakesarī
rasībhavanti lohāni mṛtāni suravandite

original: haranti rogān sakalān rasayuktāni kiṃ punaḥ /
analyzed: haranti rogān sakalān rasa yuktāni kim punar
śīlanāt nāśayanti eva valī palita ruj jarāḥ

original: nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ suvīraṃ ca dravyakarmaṇi yojayet // Ras_7.152 //
analyzed: nāgam vaṅgam suvīram ca dravya karmaṇi yojayet

original: paribālaṃ tu yallohaṃ tathā ca malayodbhavam /
analyzed: paribālam tu yat loham tathā ca malaya udbhavam
etat loha dvayam devi viśeṣāt deha rakṣaṇam
rāgam mahārasa ādīnām jñātvā bījāni sādhayet
tat mama ācakṣva deveśi kim anyat śrotum arhasi
bīja sādhana
śrī devī uvāca
mahārasānām lohānām ratnānām ca sureśvara

original: rāgasaṃkhyāṃ tathā bīja- sādhanaṃ ca vada prabho // Ras_8.1 //
analyzed: rāga saṃkhyām tathā bīja sādhanam ca vada prabho
śrī bhairavaḥ uvāca

original: giridoṣe kṣayaṃ nīte sūtakaṃ rañjayanti te // Ras_8.2 //
analyzed: giri doṣe kṣayam nīte sūtakam rañjayanti te
sasyakaḥ capalaḥ ca eva rājāvartaḥ ca mākṣikaḥ

original: vimalo gairikaṃ caiṣām ekaikaṃ dviguṇaṃ bhavet // Ras_8.3 //
analyzed: vimalaḥ gairikam ca eṣām ekaikam dviguṇam bhavet
bhrāmaka ādiṣu kānteṣu api eka dvi triguṇaḥ hi saḥ
ekaikam abhrake ca eva śveta pīta aruṇaḥ site
aṣṭādaśa sahasrāṇi sthitāḥ rāgāḥ ca gandhake

original: ayutaṃ darade devi śilāyāṃ dvisahasrakam // Ras_8.5 //
analyzed: ayutam darade devi śilāyām dvi sahasrakam
rasake sapta sāhasram kaṅkuṣṭhe tu catuṣṭayam

original: rasagarbhe prakāśante jāraṇaṃ tu bhavedyadi // Ras_8.6 //
analyzed: rasa garbhe prakāśante jāraṇam tu bhavet yadi

original: dvādaśāgraṃ śataṃ pañca nāge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ /
analyzed: dvādaśa agram śatam pañca nāge rāgāḥ vyavasthitāḥ

original: śatahīnaṃ sahasraṃ tu vaṅge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ // Ras_8.7 //
analyzed: śata hīnam sahasram tu vaṅge rāgāḥ vyavasthitāḥ
rāgāṇām śata pañcāśat śulva madhye vyavasthitāḥ

original: raktapītāśca śuklāśca hemni rāgāśca ṣoḍaśa // Ras_8.8 //
analyzed: rakta pītāḥ ca śuklāḥ ca hemni rāgāḥ ca ṣoḍaśa
rāgāḥ ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi śakranīle vyavasthitāḥ

original: mahānīle ca deveśi te rāgā dviguṇāḥ sthitāḥ // Ras_8.9 //
analyzed: mahānīle ca deveśi te rāgāḥ dviguṇāḥ sthitāḥ
māṇikye tu sureśāni rāgāḥ lakṣa trayodaśa
gaja vāri samutpannam ratnam muktāphalam viduḥ
gaje trīṇi sahasrāṇi ṣaṣ sahasrāṇi vāri je

original: navalakṣaṃ ca rāgāṇāṃ padmarāge vyavasthitāḥ // Ras_8.11 //
analyzed: nava lakṣam ca rāgāṇām padmarāge vyavasthitāḥ

original: bhedayet sarvalohāni yacca kena na bhidyate /
analyzed: bhedayet sarva lohāni yat ca kena na bhidyate

original: tadvajraṃ tasya deveśi rāgaṃ lakṣadvayaṃ viduḥ // Ras_8.12 //
analyzed: tat vajram tasya deveśi rāgam lakṣa dvayam viduḥ
ṣoḍaśa eva sahasrāṇi puṣparāge vyavasthitāḥ
pāda ūna lakṣa rāgāḥ tu proktāḥ marakate priye

original: rāgasaṃkhyāṃ na jānāti saṃkrāntasya rasasya tu /
analyzed: rāga saṃkhyām na jānāti saṃkrāntasya rasasya tu

original: adhikaṃ mārayellohaṃ hīnaṃ caiva prakāśayet // Ras_8.14 //
analyzed: adhikam mārayet loham hīnam ca eva prakāśayet

original: mānavendraḥ prakurvīta yo hi jānāti pārvati /
analyzed: mānavendraḥ prakurvīta yaḥ hi jānāti pārvati
śata koṭi pramāṇena rāga saṃkhyām prakalpayet
sparśanam ca evam ālokya śata koṭiḥ tu vidhyate

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi bījānāṃ sādhanaṃ priye /
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi bījānām sādhanam priye
hema tāra vaśāt bījam dvividham tāvat īśvari
pīta aruṇaiḥ hema bījam tāra bījam sitaiḥ bhavet

original: kalpitaṃ rañjitaṃ pakvam iti bhūyastridhā bhavet // Ras_8.17 //
analyzed: kalpitam rañjitam pakvam iti bhūyas tridhā bhavet
kalpitam dvividham tat ca śuddha miśra vibhedataḥ
rasa uparasa lohānām bījānām kalpanam pṛthak

original: śuddhaṃ miśraṃ tu saṃyogāt yathālābhaṃ sureśvari // Ras_8.19 //
analyzed: śuddham miśram tu saṃyogāt yathālābham sureśvari
sattvam āvartitam vyomni śodhitam kāca ṭaṅkaṇaiḥ

original: pakvaṃ niviḍitaṃ devi rasapiṣṭikṣamaṃ bhavet // Ras_8.20 //
analyzed: bhavet
sneha kṣāra amlavargaiḥ ca śilāyāḥ ca puṭa trayāt

original: vaṅgasyāpi vidhānena tālakasya hatasya vā // Ras_8.21 //
analyzed: vaṅgasya api vidhānena tālakasya hatasya vā
tāpya hiṅgulayoḥ vā api hate ca rasakasya vā

original: rasagarbhe dravet kṛṣṇaṃ pattraṃ kanakatārayoḥ // Ras_8.22 //

analyzed: saṃkara ākhyam tu durmelyam priye mṛdu khara āhvayam
tatas saṃmṛditam devi dvaṃdvamelāpanam drutam

original: bhavet samarasaṃ garbhe rasarājasya ca dravet // Ras_8.23 //
analyzed: bhavet sama rasam garbhe rasarājasya ca dravet

original: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi dvaṃdvamelāpanaṃ śṛṇu // Ras_8.24 //
analyzed: atas param pravakṣyāmi dvaṃdvamelāpanam śṛṇu

original: kṣīratailena sudhmātaṃ hemābhraṃ milati priye // Ras_8.25 //

analyzed: anena eva vidhānena tārābhram api melayet
vaṅgam āvartya deveśi punar sūtaka yojitam

original: andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ vaṅgābhraṃ milati kṣaṇāt // Ras_8.27 //
analyzed: andhamūṣā gatam dhmātam vaṅgābhram milati kṣaṇāt
cūrṇam nara kapālasya strī stanyam vana śigrukam
āvartya kaṭutailena bhasma apāmārga jam kṣipet

original: vaṅgābhraṃ haritālaṃ ca nāgābhre tu manaḥśilāḥ // Ras_8.30 //
analyzed: vaṅgābhram haritālam ca nāgābhre tu manaḥśilāḥ

original: vaṅgābhraṃ haritālena nāgābhraṃ śilayā milet // Ras_8.31 //

analyzed: etad pralipta mūṣāyām su dhmātāḥ tīvra vahninā
kānta abhra śaila vimalāḥ milanti sakalān kṣaṇāt
mūṣā lepena kurute sarva dvaṃdveṣu melanam

original: abhrakaṃ surasā śṛṅgaṃ maṇḍūkasya vasā viṣam /
analyzed: abhrakam surasā śṛṅgam maṇḍūkasya vasā viṣam
guñjā ṭaṅkaṇa yogena sarva sattveṣu melanam
milanti sarva dvaṃdvāni strī stanya paripeṣitaiḥ

original: strīstanyapeṣitaiḥ sarvaṃ dvaṃdvajaṃ tu rasāyane // Ras_8.37 //
analyzed: strī stanya peṣitaiḥ sarvam dvaṃdva jam tu rasāyane

original: andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ saṃkaraṃ milati kṣaṇāt // Ras_8.38 //
analyzed: andhamūṣā gatam dhmātam saṃkaram milati kṣaṇāt
vāpitam sasyakaiḥ daradena ca

original: khasattvaṃ syānnibaddhaṃ ca dṛḍhaṃ dhmātaṃ milettataḥ // Ras_8.39 //
analyzed: kha sattvam syāt nibaddham ca dṛḍham dhmātam milet tatas
rasa uparasa lohāni sarvāṇi ekatra dhāmayet

original: anyonyaṃ dvaṃdvatāṃ yānti dravanti salilaṃ yathā // Ras_8.40 //
analyzed: anyonyam dvaṃdva tām yānti dravanti salilam yathā

original: bījāni kalpitānyevaṃ rañjitāni paraṃ śṛṇu // Ras_8.41 //
analyzed: bījāni kalpitāni evam rañjitāni param śṛṇu
dvaṃdvitam tāpya sattvena rasarājasya rañjanam
kunaṭī gandhapāṣāṇaiḥ hemamākṣika hiṅgulaiḥ

original: vāpitaṃ sevitaṃ rakta- gaṇaiḥ snehairmṛtaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: vāpitam sevitam rakta gaṇaiḥ snehaiḥ mṛtam tatas
rañjanam rasarājasya tīkṣṇa tāmrau viśeṣataḥ

original: kevalaṃ vimalaṃ tāmraṃ vāpitaṃ daradena ca /
analyzed: kevalam vimalam tāmram vāpitam daradena ca

original: kurute triguṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ lākṣābhaṃ nirmalaṃ rasam // Ras_8.45 //
analyzed: kurute triguṇam jīrṇam lākṣā ābham nirmalam rasam
dattvā

original: kṛṣṇābhrakasya cūrṇaṃ ca raktavargair muhuḥ puṭaiḥ // Ras_8.46 //
tāpyena vā mṛtaṃ hema triguṇena nivāpitam /
analyzed: tāpyena vā mṛtam hema triguṇena nivāpitam
bhāṇḍikāyām tu rasakam tāpya saindhava saṃyutam
indragopa nibham yāvat sarvam dviguṇa jāraṇāt

original: drutaṃ hemanibhaṃ sūtaṃ kurute nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ras_8.48 //
analyzed: drutam hema nibham sūtam kurute na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: abhrakaṃ hema tāmraṃ ca śilayā mākṣikeṇa ca /
analyzed: abhrakam hema tāmram ca śilayā mākṣikeṇa ca

original: gairikeṇa ca mukhyena rasakena ca rañjayet // Ras_8.49 //
analyzed: gairikeṇa ca mukhyena rasakena ca rañjayet
bījāni rañjitāni evam pakva bījāni atas śṛṇu
mahārasān uparasān tīkṣṇalohāni ca kṣipet
śataśas vāpayet etat akṣīṇam sa avaśeṣitam

original: samāṃśaṃ rasarājasya garbhe dravati niścitam // Ras_8.52 //

analyzed: tat etat viṣṭikā stambhe jāraṇāyām sureśvari

original: rañjane rasarājasya sāraṇāyāṃ ca śasyate // Ras_8.53 //
analyzed: rañjane rasarājasya sāraṇāyām ca śasyate
tat eva śataśas rakta gaṇaiḥ snehaiḥ niṣecitam

original: adhikaṃ śasyate teṣu sahasrāṃśena vedhakṛt // Ras_8.54 //
analyzed: adhikam śasyate teṣu sahasra aṃśena vedha kṛt
nirvyūḍham nāga vaṅgābhyām kriyāyām hema tārayoḥ

original: khasattvaṃ raviṇā yojyaṃ dvaṃdvitaṃ syādrasāyane // Ras_8.55 //

analyzed: sa sneha kṣāra pañcāmlaiḥ rasaiḥ taiḥ tālaka ādibhiḥ
sama dvi triguṇān tāmre vāhayet vaṅga pannagān

original: rasakaṃ vāpitaṃ śaśvac- cūrṇitaṃ hemni vāhayet // Ras_8.58 //
nāgo nirjīvatāṃ yāti puṭayogaiḥ punaḥ punaḥ // Ras_8.59 //
analyzed: nāgaḥ nirjīva tām yāti puṭa yogaiḥ punar punar
rasa tālaka śaṅkha abhra ciñcā kṣāraiḥ tathā trapuḥ

original: mṛtaṃ nāgaṃ mṛtaṃ vaṅgaṃ śulvaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ ca vā mṛtam /

analyzed: ekaikam uttame hemni vāhayet suravandite

original: nirutthe pannage hemni nirvyūḍhe śataśo gaṇe /
analyzed: nirutthe pannage hemni nirvyūḍhe śataśas gaṇe
gorocanā nibham dhāma bhāskare tāra saṃnibham
tīkṣṇābhrakam ravi samam mākṣikam dviguṇam tathā

original: āvartitaṃ cūrṇitaṃ ca māritaṃ saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ // Ras_8.62 //
analyzed: āvartitam cūrṇitam ca māritam saptabhiḥ puṭaiḥ

original: vyūḍhe śataguṇe hemni tadbījaṃ jārayet samam /
analyzed: vyūḍhe śataguṇe hemni tat bījam jārayet samam

original: ūrdhvādho mākṣikaṃ dattvā śulvaṃ hemasamaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: ūrdhva adhas mākṣikam dattvā śulvam hema samam bhavet

original: evaṃ daśaguṇaṃ vyūḍhaṃ bījaṃ kāraṇasaṃnibham // Ras_8.64 //
analyzed: evam daśaguṇam vyūḍham bījam kāraṇa saṃnibham

original: mākṣikeṇa hataṃ tacca bīje nirvāhayet priye // Ras_8.65 //
analyzed: mākṣikeṇa hatam tat ca bīje nirvāhayet priye

original: dvātriṃśadguṇitaṃ hemni nāgaṃ tāpyaṃ hataṃ vahet /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat guṇitam hemni nāgam tāpyam hatam vahet
triṃśadguṇa śilā āvāpam nāga bījam udāhṛtam
tāpya tālaka vāpena sattvam pīta abhrakasya tu

original: bīje nirvāhayed etat yoṣāmṛṣṭasya vedhakam // Ras_8.67 //
analyzed: bīje nirvāhayet etat yoṣā mṛṣṭasya vedhakam

original: nāgaḥ karoti mṛdutāṃ nirvyūḍhastāṃ ca raktatām /
analyzed: nāgaḥ karoti mṛdu tām nirvyūḍhaḥ tām ca rakta tām

original: vāpitaṃ pītatāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kāntasthāṃ kālikāṃ viṣam // Ras_8.68 //
analyzed: vāpitam pīta tām tīkṣṇam kānta sthām kālikām viṣam
hema bījam iti proktam tāra bījam atas śṛṇu
rasakam sama bhāgikam

original: vaṅgabhāgāstu catvāraḥ sarvaṃ dhmātaṃ vicūrṇitam // Ras_8.70 //
analyzed: vaṅga bhāgāḥ tu catvāraḥ sarvam dhmātam vicūrṇitam

original: puṭena nihataṃ kāryaṃ vyūḍhaṃ tāraṃ tu vedhayet /
analyzed: puṭena nihatam kāryam vyūḍham tāram tu vedhayet

original: dvātriṃśatsadguṇaṃ tāre vaṅge tāpyaṃ hataṃ vahet /
analyzed: dvātriṃśat sat guṇam tāre vaṅge tāpyam hatam vahet
triṃśadguṇāt tāla vāpāt vaṅga bījam udāhṛtam

original: kuṭilaṃ vimalaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ khasattvaṃ cāpi vāhayet /
analyzed: kuṭilam vimalam tīkṣṇam kha sattvam ca api vāhayet
śukla puṣpa gaṇaiḥ sekam sneha yuktaiḥ tu kārayet

original: uktāni tārabījāni bījānāṃ rañjanaṃ śṛṇu // Ras_8.73 //
analyzed: uktāni tāra bījāni bījānām rañjanam śṛṇu
tīkṣṇa mākṣika śulvam ca nāgam capala māritam

original: sindūrasaṃnibhaṃ yāvat tena bījāni rañjayet // Ras_8.74 //
analyzed: sindūra saṃnibham yāvat tena bījāni rañjayet
nidhāya kharpare nāgam brahma bīja dalaiḥ saha

original: dagdhamagnimadho dattvā vahnivarṇaṃ yadā bhavet // Ras_8.75 //
analyzed: dagdham agnim adhas dattvā vahni varṇam yadā bhavet
vāsakena vibhītena śāka kiṃśuka śigrubhiḥ
koraṇḍakasya puṣpeṇa bakulasya arjunasya ca
ahimāreṇa nāginyā kumāryā nāga kanyayā
śilayā ca triguṇayā kvathitena aja vāriṇā

original: bhāvitaṃ kharparasthaṃ ca plāvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: bhāvitam kharpara stham ca plāvayitvā punar punar
saptabhiḥ divasaiḥ eva māritam suravandite
puṭayet gandhakena ādau āmlaiḥ ca tad anantaram
idam dalānām bījānām rasarājasya rañjane

original: udghāṭe krāmaṇe yojyaṃ piṣṭīstambhe viśeṣataḥ // Ras_8.79 //
analyzed: udghāṭe krāmaṇe yojyam piṣṭī stambhe viśeṣataḥ
anyāni rakta puṣpāṇi piṣṭvā lākṣā rasena tu

original: tailaṃ vipācayeddevi tena bījāni rañjayet // Ras_8.81 //
analyzed: tailam vipācayet devi tena bījāni rañjayet
dviguṇe rakta puṣpāṇām rakta pīta gaṇasya ca

original: kvāthe caturguṇe kṣīre tailamekaṃ sureśvari // Ras_8.82 //

original: hāṭakena samāyuktaṃ guṭikā khecarī bhavet // Ras_12.373 //
analyzed: hāṭakena samāyuktam guṭikā khecarī bhavet
tinduke dvi sahasra āyuḥ jambīre tri sahasrakam
mātuluṅge ca nāraṅge catur pañca sahasrakam
rambhā phale ṣaṣ sahasram panase sapta saṃkhyakam
vibhītaka phale ca eva daśa sāhasra saṃkhyakam
nārikele mahābhāge sahasrāṇi caturdaśa

original: triṃśatsahasraṃ padme ca lakṣamāmalake punaḥ // Ras_12.377 //
analyzed: triṃśat sahasram padme ca lakṣam āmalake punar
abhra pattra drave kvātham ahorātram śilodake
tasmāt tu ca uddhṛtam sūtam mṛtyu dāridrya nāśanam
sāraṇā krama yogena navīnam jāyate vapuḥ

original: rase rasāyane caiva lakṣavedhī na saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.379 //
analyzed: rase rasāyane ca eva lakṣa vedhī na saṃśayaḥ
kardamam ca kumāryāḥ ca rasena kṛta golakam
dhamanāt patate sattvam mukhe tat dhārayet naraḥ

original: ṣaṇmāsena prayogeṇa hy ajarāmaratāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.380 //
analyzed: ṣaṣ māsena prayogeṇa hi ajara amara tām vrajet
srotoñjana yutam dhmātam sattvam pārada miśritam

original: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre adṛśyo bhavati dhruvam // Ras_12.381 //
analyzed: tam khoṭam dhārayet vaktre adṛśyaḥ bhavati dhruvam
yasya yaḥ vidhiḥ āmnātaḥ udakasya śiva āgame

original: rasenaiva tu kāle tu kuryādeva rasāyanam // Ras_12.382 //
analyzed: rasena eva tu kāle tu kuryāt eva rasāyanam
